main.name: Andrew Nguyen
main.description: Seeking experience to become a better full-stack developer.
main.bio: I'm a curious individual and love challenging myself with new and different problems. I am most comfortable with Typescript and C++ but can probably pick up any programming language you throw at me.
main.contactmessage: Contact me through email at andrew.nguyen2045@outlook.com.

events.description: Took part in solving an industry problem with refereeing company Ignite Refereeing by implementing research papers on field segmentation and using computer vision techniques.
